    • RegisterProject

      public boolean RegisterProject(String name, String clientName, double budget, int day, int month, int year, String managerNameG, String managerNumG, String managerNameC, String managerNumC, int durationStage1, int durationStage2, int durationStage3, int durationStage4, int durationStage5, int durationStage6)
      This method register the info of the projects
      Parameters:
      name - String name of the project
      description - String description of a project
      budget - double budget of an unit
      day - int initial day of project
      month - int initial month of project
      year - int initial month of project
      managerNameG - String name of the manager from greenSQA
      managerNameC - String name of the manager from client
      managerNumC - String number of the manager from client
      managerNumG - String number of the manager from greenSQA
      durationStage1 - int expected duration of the stage 1
      durationStage2 - int expected duration of the stage 2
      durationStage3 - int expected duration of the stage 3
      durationStage4 - int expected duration of the stage 4
      durationStage5 - int expected duration of the stage 5
      durationStage6 - int expected duration of the stage 6
      Returns:
      boolean

      Returns:
      msg string message with the information of a project

    • endStages

      public void endStages(String name, int day, int month, int year, int newStageStatus)
      This method allows to end the state of a stage
      Parameters:
      name - String name of the project to end one stage
      day - int day of ending of a stage
      month - int month of of ending of a stage
      year - int year of of ending of a stage
      newStatus - int assignates the new status

    • registerKnowledgeUnit

      public boolean registerKnowledgeUnit(String projectName, String id, String description, int type, String learnedLessons, String nameColab, String jobColab, String hashtag)
      This method register the information of a knowledge units
      Parameters:
      projectName - String name of the project where is going to create the unit
      id - int identifier of a knowledge unit
      description - String description of a unit
      type - int variable that assign the type of stage
      learnedLessons - String lessons of a unit
      nameColab - String name of the collaborator
      jobColab - String job of the collaborator
      Returns:
      boolean

    • consultUnits

      Returns:
      msg string message with the basic information

    • approveKnowledgeUnit

      public boolean approveKnowledgeUnit(String id, int newStatus, int day, int month, int year)
      This method allows to approve or not the state of a knowledge unit
      Parameters:
      id - String identifier of the unit to approve
      day - int day of approval of a stage
      month - int month of approval of a stage
      year - int year of approval of a stage
      newStatus - int assignates the new status of the knowledge unit
      Returns:
      boolean

      Parameters:

      Returns:
